title: Fireman arrested for exposing himself to woman in Yokohama
text:
Police in Yokohama said Friday they have arrested a 59-year-old fireman on suspicion of public indecency after he dropped his pants and exposed his lower body in front of a woman.

According to police, the incident occurred at around 10:40 p.m. on Wednesday in Naka Ward, Sankei Shimbun reported. Police said Hiroto Masuda, who works for the Yokohama Fire Department, has denied the allegation, and quoted him as saying he was drunk after being at a party with his colleagues, and can’t remember anything.

The woman told police she was walking along the sidewalk when Masuda approached her from the front and then suddenly dropped his pants and flashed her.

The woman called 110 and Masuda was arrested not too far from the scene.
